name: Princess to the Rescue - beta version
name_original: Princess to the Rescue - beta version
description:
This once happy and prosperous kingdom has been put under a horrible curse, and it's up to you to save the people and restore peace to the realm!
Princess to the Rescue is a puzzle platformer created for young children, where they can be the heroine of the story and save the day.

This version contains the first world, which takes place in the castle. The full version will have many more worlds in.

If you have any comments or feedback about the game, contact me at viki@alittleredpanda.com
